name: Stunky

attacks.name: Spray and Walk Away
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokemon with a Benched Pokemon. If you do, draw two cards, then discard one.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

flavor: These rodents fill city streets with their stinky gas. Removal teams are very careful to not draw their ire or their fire.
